learning_outcomes.description: NUTRITION - Understand and discuss the macronutrient and micronutrient recommendations for athletes involved in selected individual and team sports.
NUTRITION - Describe how various nutrition strategies can enhance training adaptation and performance for athletes involved in selected team and individual sports.
NUTRITION - Describe how various nutrition strategies can be used to enhance recovery for athletes involved in selected team and individual sports.
NUTRITION - Understand and describe the nutrition needs for specific athlete groups involved in selected individual and team sports.
NUTRITION - Demonstrate an understanding of the principles of nutrition in sport, and implement nutrition systems in your own coaching practice.
NUTRITION - Demonstrate the ability to clearly convey ideas and information about the science supporting nutrition and recovery in an applied sense relevant to selected sporting contexts.
RECOVERY - Understand the concepts underlying the principle of recovery and its role in training.
RECOVERY - Understand, design and implement various recovery strategies (physical and psychological) in your own sporting context.
RECOVERY - Provide athletes with the skills and resources to monitor their adaptive responses to stress.
RECOVERY - Apply monitoring methods to track an athlete's adaptive responses to training and competition.
RECOVERY - Identify appropriate monitoring methods for the coach and athlete.
RECOVERY - Identify the various types of fatigue that affect training and performance
RECOVERY - Demonstrate the integration of recovery strategies into the annual training plan.
RECOVERY - Evaluate the effectiveness of sport specific recovery strategies using various performance indicators.

assessments.task_description: Students will design a 3-part nutrition education series depending on their coaching context and area of interest. This will be presented as either 3 x Posters OR 3 x Tik Tok video series. Please see Blackboard for further details.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submit either as PDF of poster presentations OR provide link to Tik Tok video series.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Students will design an athlete self-monitoring log and evaluate this based on the specific coaching context and athlete/s. Please see Blackboard for further details.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submit via Turnitin submission portal on Blackboard.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Students will design and evaluate a competition recovery and nutrition program specific to their sporting context and athlete/s. Please see Blackboard for further details.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submit via Turnitin submission portal on Blackboard.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
